servinfo.title: DTC B1717: Unregistered Keyless Start Control Module

servinfosub.title: Circuit Description
servinfosub.ptxt: B1717 is detected when ECM detects different ID codes registered in ECM and keyless control module after turning engine start knob to ON position. Normally, when keyless start control module is replaced with new one, ECM automatically registers the ID code in keyless start control module after turning ignition switch to ON position. However, when keyless start control module is replaced with used one, ECM does not automatically register the ID code in keyless start control module even if ignition switch is turned to ON position.

entry.ptxt: ECM detects different ID codes registered in ECM and keyless start control module.

action.ptxt: Go to Immobilizer Control System Check:Diesel Engine Model .

testgroup.title: Registration of ECM

test1.ptxt: Register ECM to immobilizer control system referring to Procedure after ECM Replacement:Diesel Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Was registration of ECM to immobilizer control system completed?

testgroup.title: DTC check for ECM

test1.ptxt: Check ECM for DTC referring to DTC Check:Diesel Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Is DTC B1716 and/or B1718 detected other than B1717?
